column5: im not impressed with the hockey night song changing. it will never be the same.  its like going to a game at the acc, or the bell centre in montreal.  its not the same as the gardens or forum and never will be.  the wow feeling of those 2 barns are gone!  2 main reasons i tune into watch my leafs lose every saturday night.  One is the intro hockey night in canada song (gives me chills) and 2 is coaches corner.  1 is gone and with grapes getting older both may be gone.  guess i will take up ice fishng if they both go one day.  Cheers!
ok this bothers me so much im going to comment again.  Not have the hockey night in canada theme song is like fishing in your driveway, its just not normal.  Cheers!
Then enjoy it, and hold your hockey comments for winter

I wonder if TSN is actually going to use the old CBC songs ... that's gona be even more weird.  Maybe some bored politicians will make this a discussion topic during parliament meetings and force TSN to give the song back.... they've done similar stupid thing calling in Hockey Canada about why getting Doan as captain.... this song thing is even more important!

Only the morons at CBC could screw up there only money making program. For years I have been wanting the govt to eleminate this program, this just proves my point. Get ready for the 49762 version of Ann of Green Gables!
Leafs TV will fill yer needs.
